title: Regrets
description: Matthew who finds a perfect job has to sacrifice his freedom. He owns everything but isnâ€™t happy. He finds out from one of his help why his freedom was taken away. Matthew whose a decent man decides to go after the person. Allison is avenging the person who is responsible for destroying her life. Matthew and Allison cross paths because she was responsible for taking away his freedom. Matthew regrets deceiving Allison because he only heard one side of the story. He let greed and anger in his heart lead the way. Matthew avenge Allison's revenge and gives her back everything that she owns. Allison started falling for Matthew and forgave him, but Matthew never forgave himself. Although, he had love in his heart, but never had the courage to face Allison again.
author: Sarah Younus
